mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_reg_date) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select count(member_id) from member where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(member_phone) from member where member_phone = #{memberPhone}
select count(*) from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}
